api_list.name: Verify Email
api_list.description:
Verify an Email in real time (valid, invalid, catch-all, unknown)

Status :
- **valid** : mailbox exists and the hard bounce probability is <1%
- **invalid** : mailbox doesn't exists and the mail will definitely get rejected
- **catch-all** : mail server is configured with catch-all, so the mail box might exist, but we can't verify it, you should not get hard bounces.
- **unknown** : rare occurence, might happens on timeouts, ...
